title: Sainsbury's in $10bln swoop on Walmart's Asda
text:
Sainsbury's in $10bln swoop on Walmart's Asda 1:42pm BST - 01:58
Sainsbury's and Asda, the UK arm of Walmart, confirmed on Monday they had agreed a $18.33 billion merger to create Britain's biggest supermarket group by market share, surpassing current leader Tesco. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Sainsbury's and Asda, the UK arm of Walmart, confirmed on Monday they had agreed a $18.33 billion merger to create Britain's biggest supermarket group by market share, surpassing current leader Tesco.
